description: Upward Mobility presents our NREMT EMT Basic Exam Prep app for Palm webOS.  This module contains a targeted curriculum of over 500 questions designed to include all necessary content areas required for an EMT-Basic.  All questions were written exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who are certified EMTs  with a thorough and up-to-date knowledge of EMS material. *  This app provides over five hundred questions paired with clear, thorough explanations to reinforce comprehension of the material, and to bridge the gap between your basic EMT knowledge and practical patient application.  It covers all topics on the National Registry of Emergency Medical Technicians (NREMT) EMT-Basic Cognitive Exam: Airway and Breathing, Cardiology, Trauma, Medical, Obstetrics and Pediatrics, and EMS Operations.  ||  The intuitive Study Mode interface allows you to track your progress through the application and return to difficult questions during your review.  Test mode allows you to take the course as a sample NREMT EMT-Basic Exam and quickly review the questions and areas in which you may need extra help.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
